name: Underpaid
description:
Summary

In Underpaid, you play as Mark, the IT guy for a large entertainment company. Someone has hacked the company’s servers and filled them with software bugs! It is up to you to venture into the code and various genres of media to exterminate the bugs, fix the code, and try to secure that ever-elusive raise.

Features
  • Incredibly responsive player movement
  • 4 unique levels, each with a different theme and objective
  • A boss fight with several phases
  • Interactable NPCs with very humorous dialogue
  • Repeatable final level with difficulty scaling for replayability
